text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa kangaete mita no ka, moshi (kuruān ga) arrā no omoto karadeari, sore o anata gata wa kyohi shi, shikamo, Isuraeru no shison no hitori ga sore (mūsā no rippō) to, onaji monodearu to risshō shi, sore de kare jishin kuruān o shinjita no ni, anata gata wa (Nao) kōman ni mo shinjinakatta to sureba (anata gata wa fugi no to ni naru node wa nai no ka). Hontōni arrā wa, fugi no min o onmichibiki ni nara renai
